T02D2776:147b-0: @147b * // bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2776:147b-1: theg pa mchog zhugs de nyid ye shes ma mthong dang //
T02D2776:147b-2: mthong ba ji srid rnal du mi gnas res 'ga' nyid //
T02D2776:147b-3: de bzhin rnam g-yengs thibs por gyur dang mthar mi 'gro //
T02D2776:147b-4: blo gros lam ltos de dag las 'phags 'dir bshad bya //
T02D2776:147b-5: bdag lus spyi gtsug cod pan la //
T02D2776:147b-6: dpal ldan bla ma brgyud pa'i rim //
T02D2776:147b-7: ye shes shing rta'i rtsa mchog lam //
T02D2776:147b-8: drang dang bar ma chad dang dangs //
T02D2776:147b-9: de mtha' slob dpon rdo rje rtse //
T02D2776:147b-10: bdag gi tshangs gnas nam mkha'i sgor //
T02D2776:147b-11: a'i: h'um gnyis mtshan reg bsgoms la //
T02D2776:147b-12: steng rim nas ni gsol ba gdab //
T02D2776:147b-13: ma lus ye shes can rnams kyis //
T02D2776:147b-14: yang dag rim mdzad sa bon h'um //
T02D2776:147b-15: padma la ni ge sar bzhin //
T02D2776:147b-16: mkhas bas rab dad thugs kar bsgoms //
T02D2776:147b-17: zla ba la yang skar ma ltar //
T02D2776:147b-19: bcu dang gnyis bcas aa phreng gis //
T02D2776:147b-20: bskor bltas gsang sngags bzlas par bya //
T02D2776:147b-21: aom ratna gu ru shr'i aa ba lo ke te
T02D2776:147b-22: shva ra sarba aishta de bte ma h'a tishtha ne
T02D2776:147b-23: ma ma tsi ta ta ta ta dzny'a na dzva
T02D2776:147b-24: la dzva la / pra ti dzva la pra ti dzva la /
T02D2776:147b-25: pra tyud panna hri da yadzva la dzva la spa ra na sa h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2776:147b-26: gsang sngags rgyal po rig pa che //
T02D2776:147b-27: rdo rje 'bebs pa gdon mi za //
T02D2776:147b-30: rdo rje dbang phyug sa bcu'i snying //
T02D2776:147b-31: bum pa las ni rgyun bzhin du //
T02D2776:147b-32: rim gyis bdag snying sa bon la //
T02D2776:147b-33: bab gyur de yi gzi brjid bskyed //
T02D2776:147b-35: zla rgyas dkyil 'khor ltar dkar nyid //
T02D2776:147b-36: dbang po'i gzhu mdog lta bu yi //
T02D2776:147b-37: 'od kyis bdag lus gang bar bya //
T02D2776:147b-38: gang phyir bskal pa bye bar yang //
T02D2776:147b-39: 'bad byas dal bas yang min la//
T02D2776:148a-0: @148a * // bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog / bla ma'i drin thob thob par 'gyur //
T02D2776:148a-1: chu gter che las brlan pa'i rlangs bskyod dri med mkha' la mi zad sprin 'khrigs dka' ba med //
T02D2776:148a-2: rta bdun shar tshe thibs pos ma rungs gling rnams mi gsal snang bar byas la dka' ba med //
T02D2776:148a-3: nam mkha'i ngos la shugs drag drag 'khrugs glo bur sprin bsgribs dangs par byas la dka' ba med //
T02D2776:148a-4: de bzhin bdag gi chos kyi rjer gyur dam pa'i mthus kyang ye shes 'bar bar dka' ba med //
